entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Malay Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:42 PM AST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.2°C

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 early in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 12 February 2023
